plot: A priceless book is stolen from the National Library of Scotland and investigative journalist Aileen Adler - with help from her dog Watson - tracks down the thief.
plot_en: A priceless book is stolen from the National Library of Scotland and investigative journalist Aileen Adler - with help from her dog Watson - tracks down the thief.
plot_es: A priceless book is stolen from the National Library of Scotland and investigative journalist Aileen Adler - with help from her dog Watson - tracks down the thief.
title: The Lost Book
